title: Revenue earned from sports merchandise worldwide 2006 to 2015
yAxis: Merchandising revenue in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This statistic shows the Revenue earned from ( Merchandising ) in current prices in Revenue from 2006 to 2015 .
Spanish Merchandising initiated a downward trend in 2006 , with its highest point in 2011 , period of time in which Revenue 's Merchandising was down to 17.57 billion .
The Spanish Revenue earned from was steadily recovering since that Year and was projected to reach 20.07 billion in 2008 .
gold: This graph depicts the total revenue generated worldwide from sports merchandising rights from 2006 to 2010 and corresponding revenue forecasts for the years 2011 to 2015.
In 2006 , total revenues from merchandising were 19.43 billion U.S. dollars .
